name: Loopout
description:
Try playing in Fullscreen if you are experiencing any resolution/scaling issues!!

Play as a game developer in his daily activities (trying to fix all errors in different codes). Game goal is to reach Highscore before tasks run out of time. Game can be challenging and has a learning curve. Each Task has small “hint” red error message which sometimes can help.

Controls:
  • WASD - movement
  • SPACE - Interact with Computer to open up Tasks
  • MouseLeftButton - Interact inside Tasks
Tools:
  • Unity
  • Audacity
  • Photoshop
